item.display_long_description:
Grab your sticks, drum up the beat and unleash your inner Taiko Master
                                                                                                                                
![{"height":480,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/86653845_2791919520966977_4752320752841641264_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Hqq90lYAekoQ7kNvgGURiRv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYByB5G-qO-E50oFo7HkQhFwOOa3jh93RnlGuO8zCw1nTg&oe=66E2504A)

# DRUM UP THE BEAT
Taiko Frenzy is a percussion rhythm game set in a stunning, colorful scenery. Immerse yourself in fantasy world inspired by Japanese folklore with original soundtracks exclusively composed for the game.
Control the strength of your strikes to succeed in the accented beats and perfect your timing to the beat to unleash breathtaking sakura storms, boosting your score and creating a mesmerizing visual spectacle.

![{"height":480,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/429088712_767564775202495_858234571660112159_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-D7izfee7UEQ7kNvgH2RudJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDBdDtTCcnSfI86Heq4Bk-JTo9LgObLI8PwZTVngnPjjQ&oe=66E25C69)

# PROGRESS AT YOUR OWN PACE
Each original track offers 4 difficulty levels providing a rewarding learning curve, easy to learn, hard to master! Customize the challenge with various game modifiers.
Climb the leaderboards and strive to unlock all the medals, aiming to become the ultimate Taiko Master.

![{"height":480,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031616_339385168931388_546199833945281442_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Vm1DVDRhRfwQ7kNvgFbp5_0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBg7C6VynDlqvNIYMnoH2tV9vIZCInzx5ZFh_uIuHSkCg&oe=66E27125)

# UNLOCK LEGENDARY SKINS
Your progress in songs is rewarded with XP and achievements, unlocking over 100 cosmetics. Satisfy your collector’s soul and showcase your unique style!

![{"height":480,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75568720_398008849890431_1461850357418833065_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Fc6mP21Rt4oQ7kNvgG5yr9K&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBkJMnUwDaPVQAjLysEsK0sXqt1WNJhmDQQkoO8mfv9Uw&oe=66E26C9C)

# CREATE YOUR OWN SONGS
Let your creativity flow with the custom song feature and creation tool, enabling you to compose and play your personalized drumming masterpieces, putting your creativity in the spotlight.

![{"height":480,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031632_1152563679212917_962191103180653787_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=X66HZPafSYsQ7kNvgHof0Pp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYANCCxvzLz0lFTCY8QYIJGpko9LrW2UBU7ppu7qQTlS7Q&oe=66E2673C)

Are you ready to take on the challenge? Download Taiko Frenzy now and drum your way to mastery!

nodes.display_name: Try before you buy, games with demos

nodes.title: Taiko Frenzy is out of Early Access
nodes.body_text:
Greetings everyone,

It's been quite a journey! Over the past few months, we’ve worked closely with Meta to transition out of Early Access and bring Taiko Frenzy to the main store. After several iterations, we’re thrilled to present a stable, full version, ready to welcome even more players into our community.

We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to all of you who joined our Discord server, helping us identify bugs and make the game better!

With that said, we’re excited to announce that update 1.1.0 is now live.

What's New?
- Spanish language support: The entire game is now available in Spanish.
- Custom songs enhancements: Start offset (for better grid beat alignment) and floating BPM are now supported.
- TF Editor optimization: Third-party imports are now more efficient, providing better results when converting maps from Beatsaber, Ragnarock, or osu! taiko!
- Track scan in TF Editor: Opening a track now triggers a scan that automatically detects and attempts to correct note timing errors.

Bug fixes
- Stable connection: Online service connections should now be stable (previously, the reconnect button didn’t always function as expected).
- Currency cap fix: Currency gain is now correctly disabled when the maximum amount of coins is reached.
- UI animation fix: UI animations now play at the correct framerate.
- Inventory fix: Equipment from your inventory will now correctly apply between game launches.

Don’t forget to check out the custom song editor here: https://github.com/glitchrstudio/tfeditor

We’re optimistic about the upcoming changes on the Meta Horizon Store and look forward to welcoming new players into the community.

Stay tuned for future updates, and please stop by our Discord server to say hello:  https://discord.gg/mBWfpkcgAj

Enjoy the game, and see you soon!

nodes.title: Release 1.0 is available now
nodes.body_text:
After 18 months of work, Glitchr Studio is proud to announce that version 1.0 of Taiko Frenzy has finally arrived. This also means, as we previously announced, that the game is switching to a paid model. From now on, all game content (OST songs, custom song feature) will be available once you purchase the game. We would like to warmly thank our Founders who supported us from the beginning of development; we have prepared a little surprise for you available in the game.

What's New?
- 5 new original compositions have been added to the music library. The game now features 20 songs playable in all difficulty modes.
- Progression System: Each song will now earn you XP based on your performance. This XP will allow you to level up in the Taiko Pass. Each level of the Taiko Pass will grant you rewards.
- Cosmetic Items: We have crafted over 100 equippable items to personalize your gameplay experience with style (stick skins, Taiko colors, Taiko skins, stick charms).
- The Easy difficulty for all songs has been reworked to provide better progression in difficulty.
- Game modifiers have been added to allow you, for example, to play your favorite songs without accents or side hits (at the cost of a score reduction).
- Achievements have been implemented (over 60) to provide you with challenges to reach.
- The score thresholds for unlocking different medals have been revised for more consistency.

Optimizations
- A brand new 90Hz mode for Quest 3.
- Quest 2 optimizations
- Audio mastering has been redone for all songs to significantly improve sound quality and immersion.
- New revamped UI for better ergonomics.
- Optimizations and polish of the environment.
- Kodama rework with new cool animations in sync with the music.
- Few bug fixes.
- Reworked tutorial for better accessibility.

Due to these numerous changes, player saves have been reset, as well as the leaderboards for all Easy difficulties.

As you can see, this 1.0 release represents the biggest update the game has ever seen, and we hope to continue adding more content in the future. That's why we still need your help to spread the word about the game and talk about it to others.

As always, we invite you to join the discussion and grow the community on our Discord server: https://discord.gg/mBWfpkcgAj

Have fun and see you soon for new adventures!

item.user_data_disclosure_translated: This app may access your display name, username, profile pictures, avatars, age group and a list of followers and people you follow who also own this app.
